name: get-grantOffers-grantOfferId
description: Returns the details of a single grant offer.

grantOfferId.description: The unique identifier of the grant offer.

$ul: **accountHolderId**: The identifier of the account holder to which the grant is offered.
**amount**
**currency**: The three-character [ISO currency code](https://docs.adyen.com/development-resources/currency-codes).
**value**: The amount of the transaction, in [minor units](https://docs.adyen.com/development-resources/currency-codes).
**contractType**: The contract type of the grant offer. Possible value: **cashAdvance**, **loan**.
**expiresAt**: The end date of the grant offer validity period.
**fee**
**amount**
**currency**: The three-character [ISO currency code](https://docs.adyen.com/development-resources/currency-codes).
**value**: The amount of the transaction, in [minor units](https://docs.adyen.com/development-resources/currency-codes).
**id**: The unique identifier of the grant offer.
**repayment**
**basisPoints**: The repayment that is deducted daily from incoming net volume, in [basis points](https://www.investopedia.com/terms/b/basispoint.asp).
**term**
**estimatedDays**: The estimated term for repaying the grant, in days.
**maximumDays**: The maximum term for repaying the grant, in days. Only applies when `contractType` is **loan**.
**threshold**
**amount**
**currency**: The three-character [ISO currency code](https://docs.adyen.com/development-resources/currency-codes).
**value**: The amount of the transaction, in [minor units](https://docs.adyen.com/development-resources/currency-codes).
**startsAt**: The starting date of the grant offer validity period.
